snippet.title: The effect of basketball footwear on the vertical ground reaction force during the landing phase of drop jumps
snippet.description: The effect of basketball footwear on the vertical ground reaction force during the landing phase of drop jumps / Cámara Tobalina, Jesús (Universidad del País Vasco. Departamento de Educación Física y Deportiva) ; Calleja-González, Julio (Universidad del País Vasco. Departamento de Educación Física y Deportiva) ; Martínez de Santos, Raúl (Universidad del País Vasco. Departamento de Educación Física y Deportiva) ; Fernández–López, Juan Ramón (KIROLENE) ; Arteaga-Ayarza, Asier (Gerdau Sidenor I+D) ; Universidad del País Vasco. Laboratorio de Análisis del Rendimiento Deportivo Even though the aetiology of overuse injuries is multifactorial, repetitive impacts and insufficient cushioning have been pointed out as the. main causes of injury. These impacts are characterized at the vertical ground reaction force by 2 peaks. The first corresponds to the landing of the forefoot (F1) and the second (F2), associated to the production of injuries. [...] 2013 Revista de psicología del deporte, Vol. 22, Núm. 1 (2013) , p. 179-182
